line.text: How can my muse want subject to invent
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: While thou dost breathe that pour into my verse
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thine own sweet argument too excellent
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For every vulgar paper to rehearse
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: O give thy self the thanks if aught in me
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Worthy perusal stand against thy sight
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For who so dumb that cannot write to thee
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When thou thy self dost give invention light
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Be thou the tenth Muse ten times more in worth
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Than those old nine which rhymers invocate
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And he that calls on thee let him bring forth
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Eternal numbers to outlive long date
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: If my slight muse do please these curious days
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The pain be mine but thine shall be the praise
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
